review: Just playing the demo I could feel the nostalgia, Back when I was a little kid I loved this game. I recommend the game because I played it so much when I was a kid also it's simple, The game is great for anyone who just wants to relax or if your a pro you can still get the great game experience well anyway that's all.
this is one of my child hood games but now it keeps on crashing so don't get the demo pleasr don't pay 4 $ for the full game
